appendix.title: Detailed Changes from NISP Version 11 (K) to NISP Version 12 (L)

sect1.title: Detailes Changes
sect1.para: Where the previous two sections eplisit lists added and deleted standard since the latest release of NISP. The enclosed spreadsheet lists all changes, such as:
